website_summaries.verdict: For anyone looking for a stylish pair of rain boots that can be worn even indoors, these easy-to-wear and fashionable boots are a must-have.
pros: Flexible fit that is ideal for any foot size, even those with wider feet
Boots offer good traction to ensure no slippage
Short ankle height and availability in a range of colors makes these fashionable enough to wear all day long
cons: Many purchasers opted to buy additional insoles for added comfort

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely perfect for the rain! Also they come with insoles so you have extra comfort. I wear a size 8 to 8 1/2 with boots; I like to get a size 8 1/2 so I can wear thick cozy socks. A size 39 is equivalent to a size 8 1/2 and they fit so comfortably. Definitely recommend for everyone! :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Finally rain boots that fit wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy a size 10 wide for all my shoes. I buy everything online so usually it's 50/50 for the fit. This pair of rainboots, however, fit me! I was very happy. I bought them based on the reviews. I only tried them on but they are comfortable and very easy to slip on. I will be using these to walk my granddaughter down to the bus stop on rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Walston

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than my Lands End, I wore them all day working outside and even though I just got them yesterday they didn’t need to be broken in. Not stiff at all, perfect garden, yard work, rain and Northern Coast beach shoes. I bought them in Navy and they look like they’re patent leather. I’m very picky and I have not one complaint about these. I wear a 7.5 ordered an 8 . True to size but still worked without my foot sliding about inside. Looked narrow when I brought them out of the box - a concern since I have wide feet but they felt fine. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: HRH Catherine Anne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: I go to school in Santa Cruz and it rains a lot over here so I thought I should invest in some stylish rain boots. These are perfect because they aren't too clunky and obnoxious but they are able to keep warmth in and rain out. I also love how trendy they are because I don't feel like I'm wearing two traffic cones on my feet when I'm out with them on. Definitely recommend if you live somewhere with moderate rain. If the rain is severe, I'd probably invest in some taller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mashkory

customer_reviews.title: So sleek!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and wide ankles but these fit like a charm and are gorgeous. Wish the sole had more cushioning but aside from that these are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: was unable to find a good one that looks chic
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for rain boots for many years, was unable to find a good one that looks chic, can wear for long time yet allows my feet to breathe. This pair came to my attention because of high rating, also because it is ankle height. Bought it and loved it. It was so comfortable I forgot to change then in door.
customer_reviews.author: James Yan

customer_reviews.title: Tight toes!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking and ran true to size (I'm a size 9 - 100% of the time) Unfortunately, the toes are so point they would never work for walking any distance....ouchy. If all you want to do in these boots is walk to the car and back they would be fine but I walk my dogs 3-5 miles a day in the rain (when necessary!) and these would not work with toes all jammed up in front! Also these are described as navy blue and even in very bright light the color is so dark they look closer to black.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I left a 4 star rating on these boots. They are beautiful but after wearing them outside for a few hours the front on the boot started to rub against my toes and they were hurting a lot. I wasn't able to deal with the pain so I had to return them as well. I am very sad =(.
customer_reviews.author: T.V.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish galoshes = Winner
customer_reviews.text: I wore these rain boots during the recent storm in California’s Bay Area. Traction on wet pavement/floors were not a problem. The fit was the best of other brands that I tried and comfortable to walk several blocks. My normal size is 8M but I got 8.5 based on the size chart that gave the foot length measurement which is more important to consider than size label. The look of the “patent leather” style drew many compliments because these rain boot do NOT look like typical galoshes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EvergreenGal

customer_reviews.title: Everyday boots! Love them.
customer_reviews.text: You guys! These rain boots are life! Ever since I got them they have been my go to shoes! Slip on so quick, casual look, and super comfy. These rainboots aren’t baggy like most are, they fit snug enough to be comfy. So my over all review is 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Walk Like a Duck in Water :-)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. They are so similar to regular shoes, no bulk! I get so many compliments on them. The only drawback is the extremely plastic/rubber smell. But I get over it and I've worn these several times since I got them. Works perfectly. It even comes with a second pair of insoles just in case the ones that come in there get wet...or when you wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: MsJNW

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and not slippery
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute! When I got them I was somewhat worried that the sole is too thin, but after walking around them in the rain, I was pleasantly surprised. They are comfortable and not slippery, super easy to put on and take off. I have a little bot of extra room in them, so I might put in insoles for added comfort, but that is because I am a hedonist. I also like that I can tuck my pants into them so they do not get wet in the rain - the stretchy material and the wide opening make it look OK instead of dorky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed all up, but waterproof
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these guys are definitely larger than labeled. I wear a size 6 and need some thick socks or two pairs of thinner tall socks to make them fit. There isn't a lot of support in the arches, but the style is very nice and I've gotten a lot of compliments. They are definitely waterproof--I have been wearing these around the UK during the rainy months. Maybe a shoe insert and a half size down and they would be perfect. Another note--they scuff very easily. I have lots of little marks on the toes of these. Doesn't really bother me, makes them look loved, but could be important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, good for price, comparable to Sam Edelman version
customer_reviews.text: Overall, nice boots for the price. I liked them and they were comfortable, but I happened upon some Sam Edelman's that were of a similar price and slightly more comfortable. Also, I wasn't a fan of the line down the middle of the shoe on the silky toes so that swayed me to the Sam Edelman. In the picture, the shoe on the right is the silky toes and the left is the Sam Edelman.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I got roasted for these but I'll still wear them
customer_reviews.text: Hi, yeah so I got roasted for these. By my boss and coworker. Because they are very shiny, rubbery-looking (what do you expect from rainboots??), and also because they have a big, shiny button on the back which says Silky Toes. I had to affirm someone that I did not, in fact, have Silky Toes. They're comfortable though, and they do protect from rain. I plan to wear them often during the rainy/snowy seasons because of this, despite the roasts. Note: Wear them outside of your pants or with long socks, because they rubbed my skin til they bled when I wore regular socks and pants over the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Elysa

customer_reviews.title: No smells on my pair - fit fine!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these, and there was no smell for me - and I'm very sensitive to smells, so maybe it's only some shoes? They fit as expected and look fine. They seem comfortable. They come with a thinner pair of insoles in case they are too tight, but my feet felt fine with them. I have slightly narrow feed that are also "low rise" in that sandal straps are usually loose on me. These fit great with socks (not thin ones, regular ones) and I might even want to wear thicker socks so my (narrow-ish) heel doesn't lift out of them. Overall for an online, inexpensive purchase, I think these are a good buy and could easily pass at work.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Blue

customer_reviews.title: Ideal rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots...I got them to replace a different brand of knee-high water-proof boots that were too hard to get on and off. These are really comfortable. The day they arrived it was pouring outside and I wore them all over the City -- stayed dry the whole time. They fit to size, with a little extra room for orthotics or thick socks, should one need them. I chose these over the other brands because they actually came in half-sizes, which I need.
customer_reviews.author: NY Reader

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Look terrific and are super comfy. The heel height is perfect for me. I purchased for travel to Europe this spring and for San Francisco to visit my daughter. These are light enough, stylish, and COMFORTABLE to warrant making space in suitcase. Mine came with an extra pair of cushion insoles. Yippee! For comfort and to avoid chafing, I'm wearing a sockie that comes just to top of boot. (I have had surgery to repair a totally ruptured Achilles tendon, so I have an awkward scar on the back of my leg at my ankle making comfortable shoes an ongoing search.) Happy sloshing!
customer_reviews.author: MBLewis59

customer_reviews.title: Stylish shiny
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot but the rubber smell is strong . I put them outside but that did not help and then shot febreeze in them which helped. I love them and want my feet dry in May in Alaska. I wear a kind of wide 7 1/2. Ordered 8 and I can still wear a sock with them. They are cute. They are easy to pull on and pull off. Extra inserts come with in case you do not like ones provided. . Light gripping on bottom of sole. I don't think you would slip on wet surfaces, I took a ton of pics but can not download them on to this site. Shame/
customer_reviews.author: dancing queen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are very nice and stylish but don't last at all :( After only wearing them for like 6 times (for really short walks) water is entering in one of them...not waterprool at all! I would like to return them but its too late.
customer_reviews.author: jessicka

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Ordered actual size, and fit great! So comfortable! As opposed to other rain boots I tried, these came with a removable sole insert that was comfortable and would be warmer in winter. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: shell44

customer_reviews.title: very cute but not water proof on sides
customer_reviews.text: love these cute shoes and they fit fine and are pretty comfortable .. but they do leak-- i checked: all the seams are good, but the elastic decorative sides are very porous, so if you do not have significant puddles or very heavy rain you can enjoy these and keep your feet dry and don't need to worry about ruining your shoes. They do stink.. i kept them outside on my balcony for the first month. l do not live in real cold, so somewhat wet feet is not a big deal, especially if i do not wear cotton socks... and while i keep praying for more rain, we do not get much here in CA, so i love them
customer_reviews.author: pgcb

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute but slightly too big
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute but slightly too big. There is an additional pair of insoles included. I expected them to be to make the shoes more comfortable or help get a tighter fit. Nope--they're are the thinner ones! I don't think I could wear these without socks at least as tall as the boot. The top of the boot, around the ankle, rubs against my leg as I walk. One note on the color--they're very dark blue. If not for the clearly dark blue sole, I would have thought the boots black.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy1

customer_reviews.title: they're pretty comfortable. I can walk over an hour in ...
customer_reviews.text: For as affordable as these were, they're pretty comfortable. I can walk over an hour in them with no discomfort and they keep my feet nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Boot!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time and I love the boots, its very comfortable and fits perfectly. I'm so glad it arrived on time, the following day, it rained and the boots were light on my feet. I have wide feet and it was very comfortable with socks. The only problem is the the insert sole on the right foot slides slightly so it slips to the back of the boot. I changed the insert and its just fine. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MariaB

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised/ comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by these. When I first tried them on they seemed too narrow and a little tight on the top of my arch, but I wore them for about an hour of walking and they didn’t hurt my feet. I don’t think I’d wear them every day, but they are definitely good for a rainy day here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy / Great Boot for the $
customer_reviews.text: Love these rainboots! They have a trendy boot look for rainy days. I can wear them with casual wear but also with pants ir a dress & tights if I’m out for work meetings on a rainy day. I find them incredibly comfortable but you could also pop an insple in them for more cushion. I ordered the black/black size 39 ( I am typically and 8 in regular shoes and 8.5 in running shoes). Great rainboot for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down as recommended and I’m happy I did, they fit great. They are waterproof, and easy to clean. The only downside is that they REALLY make your feet sweat, but that’s to be expected. My cat already chewed up one of the rubber loops on the back, unfortunately. Keep away from naughty kitties!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa h

customer_reviews.title: Great, fashionable boots
customer_reviews.text: Great, fashionable boots. Perfect for the rain in the Pacific Northwest. I have stepped in puddles that go into the purple patch from the ankle up and keep dry. Only thing is that if you plan to do a great deal of walking, you will need to put an insert in because there is very little padding in the footbed.
customer_reviews.author: S Coker

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! I ordered these one size larger so that I could wear thicker socks with them, if desired, in colder weather. Got them for a trip to New York when I knew the weather would be cold and rainy. I wore them all day, while walking, and my feet did not hurt. Plus, they're cute!
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They’re definitely rainboot quality—completely waterproof rubber design—and the mesh detail makes them a little more interesting than your generic boot. I’m a womens U.S. size 9 (closer to 9.5 lately) and I ordered these in a size 40, but I definitely have some wiggle room. With regular socks on, I can almost walk out of them. However, with thicker socks for the weather, these are perfect to tuck jeans into and go!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dymond

customer_reviews.title: Irritating
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 39M as my typical comfy size is 8. The shoes is waterproof, looks great and go well with office dress pants. However, there’s no boot lining inside so it irritates my ankles a lot. It’s uncomfortable and redden after a few hours. In addition, the supposed “thicker” insoles are not much. I’m going to add my own insoles for extra comfort. Since I already wore it, I will just invest in thick tube socks to accommodate the shoes. Good shoes but do keep this in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and fit but very thin. It can ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and fit but very thin. It can be used for raining days in Summer. My foot was cold , maybe I need to use thick socks. I am not sure. I bought this rain boots bz I want to wear in winter or snow raining day. It not work, I have to buy another pair to wear in winter raining day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish functional and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just got these cute booties in my regular size. They're a comfortable fit with regular socks and are very easy to get on and off. They also come with an innersole. I've the way they look and fit and that they are not heavy on my feet. Should be perfect for rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: Great rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Great rain boots. I inserted insoles to these boots so I can be more comfortable. I went to Seattle and used them daily; therefore, I know these boots are true to size. Some reviews said the boots were too loose. This was not an issue for me; probably because I had insoles. Also, rain boots are not suppose to be tight. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Much prefer these to tall rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I like that they’re ankle height instead of traditional calf rain boots. It makes them a lot more versatile and able to wear with any pants without having to shove your pants into the boot. I like the color and sole. The fabric stench on the side makes them easy to get on/off. I haven’t had any issues with the side fabric getting soaked but I also don’t purposely splash in puddles.
customer_reviews.author: OreMama

customer_reviews.title: THESE SHOES SMELL HORRIBLE - RETURNING
customer_reviews.text: these shoes smell like very cheap perfume. I have them sitting in the garage to try and air them out and now the entire garage (as well as the attached laundry room) smells terrible. They are going back - yuck!
customer_reviews.author: PAL8535

customer_reviews.title: ... bought the all black rain boots and I absolutely love them. I wear a size 6
customer_reviews.text: I bought the all black rain boots and I absolutely love them. I wear a size 6.5 so I sized up to a 7, comfortable fitting. In reading some of the reviews, some said there was a strong chemical smell to the boots; however, not in my case. Sometimes I find myself wearing them when there is no rain. If you are looking for a pretty, classy and comfortable rain boots, buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for a trip to Alaska. I wear a 7 1/2 and the size 38 fits perfectly. There is an insert in the boot that can be removed if you need more room and the package includes a pair of 'bonus' inserts that are thinner than the originals that may be alternated for your particular comfort. These are not only comfortable, but they're very fashionable to boot (pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Ms DNS

customer_reviews.title: a very nice and attractive boot
customer_reviews.text: Boots are attractive and very functional. I do find the inside material to be a little scratchy without socks as I often wear them. I use them mostly for step-ins in the a.m. for garden work when things are wet. Overall... a very nice and attractive boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Overall these rainboots do the job. They are comfortable and waterproof. I purchased these for a trip to the Grand Canyon and was expecting rain. These things held up very well and my feet stayed dry! The one drawback was that they were a tad large; thankfully the shoes came with an additional insert and by wearing thick socks they fit about right. Very cute and comfy, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: They fit true to size. Other reviews saying different aren’t honest.
customer_reviews.text: They would fit true to size do not listen to any of the reviews telling you to size up for wide feet if you are an 8 buy an 8. I had to return mine bc I listened to reviews saying they didn’t fit true to size when they in fact do fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Function and cute... Yes - it exists
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I wanted something that was "fashionable" and I could wear to work ( outside sales rep) but didn't want the big boots. I'm short - those just make me feel short-er. These are awesome! Great fit and super cute - yet functional
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These fit as I expected true to size , they came with comfort soles and a thinner sole if needed they arrived quickly. I just wore them on a rainy day and got compliments right away on what GREAT BOOTS you have. I highly recommend this comfortable rain boot, they are commfy and fashionable. I bought these specifically to wear to europe and on fun Formula 1 race days I want to stay in fashion and dry these will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beiler

customer_reviews.title: Love the pointed toe!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no cushioning in the bottom (which I had to buy) but I love the pointed toe and Chelsea-boot look of these shoes! Great for light to mid-heavy rain. Would not wear them in a monsoon.
customer_reviews.author: English teacher who loves shoes

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I got them as I'm taking a trip to the UK in November and, yes, do expect rain. I wore them today for the fist time (for 12 hours) as I want to break them in. I'm still wearing them at the end of the day as they're soooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Santry

customer_reviews.title: Went by reviews for fit.
customer_reviews.text: Sized up -usually need shoe/boot in wider width. Since boot did not come in wide width I looked at reviews. I was disappointed that they were too long and width was noticeably tight. Cute boot. Wish came in wider width.
customer_reviews.author: Javelina

customer_reviews.title: So I was looking for some fashionable and comfortable rain boots
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for some fashionable and comfortable rain boots. The tall ones are heavy and clunky. These have been heaven sent, they are super comfy, cute and keep my feet dry. My first day trying them was like a monsoon out and my feet remained dry. Thank You! I think I will find other colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Liv R.

customer_reviews.title: They're very cute (I love the black and navy blue detail) and fit pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: They're very cute (I love the black and navy blue detail) and fit pretty true to size. I was comfortable wearing them all afternoon while working at a tented event on a rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Eff

customer_reviews.title: Stylish rain"ankle"boot
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and color. Had another pair different brand that look like these pair. Like my other shoes, these are not for long walks, much like wearing flats. This pair did come with inside shoe cushions inserts which I have not used yet. I get compliments. Quick shipping. I wear a 9.5 and got a size for 9 and followed the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Skinny_minny

customer_reviews.title: The perfect rain booty
customer_reviews.text: I love these rain boots! Every time I wear them, someone inevitably asks me where I got them. They are adorable, and go with everything, are light (I commute to work via public transportation so I carry a pair of flats to work), super comfy, and have great support. And most importantly, they keep my feet dry in rain and wet weather. If your considering buying a pair, don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: amagid

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big, but great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Seattle and loved them. They run a bit big - I bought 39 and am a solid 8.5. Definitely had a little bit of extra room, but if you want to wear thick socks it was OK. They kept the rain out and got a lot of compliments. Definitely look very nice for the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Size 36 fits my 6.5 feet great, nicely made boots and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 36 to replace the 37 as I wear 6.5 sized shoes, and the 36 fitted great with socks on. The order and return process are really easy and the boots are really nice. Will probably buy another pair or two in different colors. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny667

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Short Rain Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rain boots, comfortable and stylish. I wear a 7.5 and ordered size 37 in blue. Love these. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shamp

customer_reviews.title: One of My Best Purchases in a While!
customer_reviews.text: Besides being a perfect fit (!), they are very comfortable and so cute! I haven't had occasion to wear them yet, but I'm looking forward to showing them off! P.S. They're also easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: a little big but works well
customer_reviews.text: a little big but not to the point where I don't wear it. does the job as rain boots. at one point it had a rubber piece at the front but I easily ripped it off. really easy to put on, not uncomfortable or anything
customer_reviews.author: Sara Eli Vela

customer_reviews.title: not for heavy rain/puddles
customer_reviews.text: I discovered the hard way that the colored portion on the sides aren't waterproof. which I should have realized before I got my foot soaking wet by stepping in water. (it's pretty obvious in hindsight) I wanted something smaller than my big boots but I still keep reaching for my regular boots. They're "okay" but since they only cost me 10 I'll give them an extra star for being cheap :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, ordered wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and good looking rainy boots. Very soft in the inside. Unfortunately, I ordered one size up thinking I need them a little loose, but had to return them as they were way too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size looks stylish
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on many of these type of boots. I liked the looks of this one the best. I was not disappointed. It looks good enough to wear with a skirt and tights as well as jeans or pants. I wear an 8 m and I ordered the 39 fit just fine with tights or socks. There is an extra inner sole included I used it but there was little difference to the fit. I did not wear these and walk or stand continuously so I cannot speak to support. I like them and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia WeeksHoward College

customer_reviews.title: Great boots. Even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Sleek and stylish. Beautiful color. Came with extra, thinner insoles for an adjustable fit. Actually ordered a size too small at first, but was quickly offered a correct size. Amazing customer service. Don’t hesitate to ask for help!
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: ... size up after reading reviews that they weren't very comfortable so I could put shoe inserts in
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a size up after reading reviews that they weren't very comfortable so I could put shoe inserts in. I find them very comfortable now with the inserts and they go really well with most of my clothes. They do give off a bit of a weird smell, but it doesn't bother me very much.
customer_reviews.author: X. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Price, comfort, and cute...how could I lose
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has these boots and I loved the way they looked and fit, so when she sent me the Amazon information, I ordered them! Really comfortable to wear and so cute. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I'm size 6 and I got 37 to use a gel insole and thick socks. Fits great with all of these! Best worn with leggings. They do an adequate job keeping the rain out but they're sadly not that comfortable (even with gel insoles) for walking in all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sav Jon

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable or Quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality materials. They look cheaply made. The sole is very narrow; the sides of my feet extended beyond the sole. No comfort or support.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I bought these shoes. Great product for the price? They fit a little bit longer/larger than I expected, especially without the insoles (they did not stay in place) but they're stylish (had compliments) and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Servais

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the size guide, they run a bit big
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived on time and looked just like the picture (ie. cute and shiny and patent leathery). Unfortunately they were simply way too big, about a whole size larger. I am a 7 US, I ordered a 38 and but should have ordered a 37. Hope that helps. The return process was easy.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: From the picture of the pair with the black metallic insert, I thought they would be matte black, but they are shiny. Not what I was looking for but they are very nice and very comfortable....
customer_reviews.author: spareribs

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually like European sizes as they don't fit the same but ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it a little bit larger. I don't usually like European sizes as they don't fit the same but this worked out okay.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Wells

customer_reviews.title: UPDATING---Very very tight around toes
customer_reviews.text: just wanted to post an update, while the shoes are not true wide width, the seller reached out to me and were very accommodating. Foot width is wide width but toes come to a point and are VERY VERY NARROW. Bad fit, would not buy again and will not buy from company as their shoes are NOT true wide width.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Wet Chic
customer_reviews.text: Despite them being a little snug--I wear an 8.5 and ordered the 9s i think they are great. Could be that my feet were a tad swollen when I tried them on. They are darling and I'm looking forward to wearing them in when it rains in the winter and I don't want to wear my rain clogs.
customer_reviews.author: daylann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cute comfortable boots but they had a bad smell to them. Maybe its the material. I left them sitting out for a week but they still had a smell to them. I had bought them for a trip but didn’t take them because I didn’t want the smell on my clothing. Hopefully when I return home the smell will be gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannie

customer_reviews.title: It is not heavy like the traditional rain boots
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 81/2 but I brought a size 9. It fits perfectly. It is not heavy like the traditional rain boots. It is also very stylish. I would recommend these to anyone. You will enjoy wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great, keep your feet dry, just a touch small
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots and they fit perfectly to size if I was wearing light socks or stockings. But since I would most likely wear them with heavier socks in the winter snow, I returned my first pair and went up an EU size. They look really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Case

customer_reviews.title: A very comfy and stylish rainboot.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few other rain boots and they are all very stiff and always end up giving me blisters. These are very comfortable and giving. they look really nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Z S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but beware of the sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 and the 38 was much too big, even with thick socks. So I returned and ordered the 37, which fit perfectly. But it is a comfortable and cute boot.
customer_reviews.author: Giniam

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Oh so comfortable and super cute. Fits true to size. Its also lightweight and can be worn with or without socks. Can't wait for a really rain day to puddle jump like a kid again :)
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price, perfect product! I bought these last minute for a 2 week trip to England and Ireland because I didn’t want to bring my high and heavy Hunter boots. These worked wonderfully and were stylish with both jeans and black slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kelly

customer_reviews.title: All Weather Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: These rain boots are not only comfortable, but they are also great for the rainy/snowy weather we are experiencing in the Pacific Northwest. I placed a pair in cushioned insoles inside and then walked all over New York City this November. The shiny finish gives them a classy look. I would recommend them to anyone with a desire to keep their feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: kjones

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They’re comfy. There’s an extra set of cushions, so it feels like walking on pillows. Waterproof. They don’t smell like rubber or plastic at all. If they rub a little on your ankle, tuck some cuff in; but really it’s not a problem. I’ve been wearing these boots a lot more than expected. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Bertolero

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. Usually with ankle boots my ankles feel uncomfortable but not so much with these. I would def buy these again in the future. Also, I have narrow feet but these fit perfectly so you may want to size up if you don’t have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: chuchu

customer_reviews.title: Good rainy boots!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these rain boots! They’re comfortable and good quality! I would say that they fit just as I expected. But if you like to have more room to wiggle your toes, they come with a bonus pair of thinner insoles. I haven’t wore them on a rainy day yet! I will update my review if anything changes. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for running erasnds, doing outside chores, etc. Rain, puddles and mud are no Problem. They are so easy to clean and to put on and off. They are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: J. Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy rain booties!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to wear yet in slushy or rainy weather for which is what I intend to use it for. I found it's a bit too roomy but I stuck in both insoles it came with to make it fit better. Came beautifully packed. Really am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Love it and live it

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: These rain boots looks and fits much better than I ever expected! Sometimes i wonder why I should buy real boots, since these rain boots fits so well. The size fit very well, an the style is on the loose side. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine X.

customer_reviews.title: Cute if you have NARROW feet
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive pair of boots for the price, but they are way too narrow. I wear a 10M and bought a 41, which was long enough but too narrow to wear comfortably, so these are being relegated to the donation bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis Love Child

customer_reviews.title: sleek and practical
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfy, sleek, and stylish. They do feel slightly loose (I'm a standard size 6-6.5) and I got a size 37, but I would order the same size again since they're not uncomfortably so. These have been waterproof in the rain and just a chic addition to any sunny day outfit too!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: A super solution for walking in the rain
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! They fit well, and when I wear them, I always get compliments. That's not why I wear them, but it's an added plus. They work. I can step in puddles and never be concerned that my feet will get wet. They wouldn't be best for long walks because there is limited cushioning, but they are perfect for short treks.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Perfect fit and comfortable. Wore them once and have 2 scuff/scratches on each toe! So sad, as do not know how to fix these scratches. Anyone have ideas how to fix them? Gave only 4 stars because they scratch so easily. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot less clunky than most rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: Only got these so didn't yet take them through the litmus test of actual rainy adventures, but they fit well, look great, and are easy to pull on and take off (important for me!). Beautiful and really a lot less clunky looking than many rain boots I'd seen. They might need inserts for better arch support if you intend to spend a whole day in them, but I think they are overall excellent for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Annie M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 in sandals and boots and a 7.5 in tennis shoes. I ordered a 38 which I believe is a 7 and it fit perfectly. They are also very sharp looking. They feel good to wear. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Sherra

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase, that I made as Atlanta is more rainy then I expected so needed rain boots fast ! I have broad feet and they are very comfortable. It was nice to see that they provided an extra set of insoles of a different width so you can choose the more slim line depth if that is more comfortable. The sparkle version I ordered is subtle and I like it. I would highly recommend purchasing these
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: SO COMFORTABLE!! I am normally a 9.5 but ordered a 41. They are a tad big but not enough to return. I absolutely love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've used these rain boots for a couple of months now, and they are amazing. Perfect for rain and snow. They fit well and they look stylish. Can't ask for better!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: Fits Wide Feet.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 40, I typically wear a size 8W. These fit perfectly fine with some room to spare. I havent had a chance to try them out yet, but they look just as pictured and described. I'll update once i get to wear these outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wear them all the time-so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these, I'm going to buy more pairs in different colors. They are so cute I wear them all the time and not just when its raining :) These booties are so comfortable an they breath! definitely recommended - and for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: P Newton

customer_reviews.title: so when they came they were too big but it was a super easy return
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what size I was in European sizes, so when they came they were too big but it was a super easy return. They even refunded me before I shipped the item back to them. I reordered a size down and love them! Super cute, pretty comfy, and keep the water and snow out. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Rain Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They’re cute and more importantly keep out the rain like they’re supposed to. I love the fact that the manufacturer includes extra insoles in case you want some more support! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: ... birthday and I have a pair - we both love these very comfortable and sharp looking rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Gave may sister a pair for her birthday and I have a pair - we both love these very comfortable and sharp looking rain boots! Would definitely recommend them to everyone and anyone. And I would buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and the 7 1/2 boot fit my 7 1/2 foot! You couldn't walk miles in these but they are certainly good for a mile or so commuting to the office. They also included a thinner insole to be swapped out for the thicker ones that came with the boot, although I am using the thicker ones. I hasn't rained when I've worn them, but they do look waterproof. Will update if that's not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable and very fashionable. I have used them for a whole day and my feet didn't get tired; they even come with a thin and thick sole options. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: carolp

product_meta.title: Silky Toes Womens Ankle Waterproof Short Chelsea Rain Boots
feature_bullets: PLEASE USE SIZE CHART PROVIDED IN IMAGE GALLERY! DANCING IN THE RAIN is not just a statement. You will find yourself enjoying the rain with Silky Toes stylish and versatile Short Rain Boots.
RUGGED OUTSOLE. The non-slip sole ensures you don't slip on the wet floors.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL. Crafted with high quality PVC that is Durable, Yet Flexible and Comfortable to get you jumping in the showers!
COMFORT ASSURED. The Side Colored Elastics not only assure easy slip on and off, they also conform to the latest trend.
GREAT HOLIDAY GIFT. Stop searching!! Your loved ones will be forever grateful for a pair of stylish Silky Toes Rain Boots!
